# Creative Writing Assistant AI Chatbot

This is a specialized AI chatbot project focused on creative writing assistance. The application helps users with:

- Story development and plot brainstorming
- Character creation and development
- Writing style improvement
- Creative writing prompts and exercises
- Genre-specific writing guidance

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS (dark theme)
- Supabase for database and authentication
- OpenAI API for AI capabilities
- Vercel for deployment

## Design Guidelines
- Dark theme with modern, appealing UI
- Focus on user experience for creative writers
- Specialized prompts and responses for creative writing tasks
- Not a generic problem-solving chatbot

## Development Notes
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow Next.js 15 App Router patterns
- Implement proper error handling
- Ensure responsive design
- Optimize for both desktop and mobile
